verses.verse: לֵ֣ץ <WH3887> [is] a mocker הַ֭יַּין <WH3196> Wine הֹמֶ֣ה <WH1993> [is] raging שֵׁכָ֑ר <WH7941> strong drink וְכָל־ <WH3605> and whoever שֹׁ֥גֶה <WH7686> and whosoever is deceived בּ֝֗וֹ לֹ֣א <WH3808> is not יֶחְכָּֽם׃ <WH2449> thereby is not wise

נַ֣הַם <WH5099> [is] as the roaring כַּ֭כְּפִיר <WH3715> of a lion אֵ֣ימַת <WH367> The fear מֶ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> of a king מִ֝תְעַבְּר֗וֹ <WH5674> [whoso] provoketh him to anger חוֹטֵ֥א <WH2398> sinneth נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH5315> [against] his own soul

כָּב֣וֹד <WH3519> [It is] an honour לָ֭אִישׁ <WH376> for a man שֶׁ֣בֶת <WH7674> to cease מֵרִ֑יב <WH7379> from strife וְכָל־ <WH3605> any אֱ֝וִ֗יל <WH191> but every fool יִתְגַּלָּֽע׃ <WH1566> will be meddling

מֵ֭חֹרֶף <WH2779> by reason of the cold עָצֵ֣ל <WH6102> The sluggard לֹא־ <WH3808> does not יַחֲרֹ֑שׁ <WH2790> will not plow [יִשְׁאַל כ] (וְשָׁאַ֖ל <WH7592> ask counsel ק) בַּקָּצִ֣יר <WH7105> in harvest וָאָֽיִן׃ <WH369> and has

מַ֣יִם <WH4325> water עֲ֭מֻקִּים <WH6013> [is like] deep עֵצָ֣ה <WH6098> Counsel בְלֶב־ <WH3820> in the heart אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> of man וְאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> but a man תְּבוּנָ֣ה <WH8394> of understanding יִדְלֶֽנָּה׃ <WH1802> will draw it out

רָב־ <WH7230> Most אָדָ֗ם <WH120> men יִ֭קְרָא <WH7121> will proclaim אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every one חַסְדּ֑וֹ <WH2617> his own goodness וְאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> man אֱ֝מוּנִ֗ים <WH529> but a faithful מִ֣י <WH4310> who יִמְצָֽא׃ <WH4672> who can find
מִתְהַלֵּ֣ךְ <WH1980> [man] walketh בְּתֻמּ֣וֹ <WH8537> in his integrity צַדִּ֑יק <WH6662> The just אַשְׁרֵ֖י <WH835> [are] blessed בָנָ֣יו <WH1121> his children אַחֲרָֽיו׃ <WH310> after

מֶ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> A king יוֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> that sitteth in עַל־ <WH5921> on כִּסֵּא־ <WH3678> the throne דִ֑ין <WH1779> of judgment מְזָרֶ֖ה <WH2219> scattereth away בְעֵינָ֣יו <WH5869> with his eyes כָּל־ <WH3605> all רָֽע׃ <WH7451> all evil
מִֽי־ <WH4310> Who יֹ֭אמַר <WH559> Who can say זִכִּ֣יתִי <WH2135> clean לִבִּ֑י <WH3820> I have made my heart טָ֝הַ֗רְתִּי <WH2891> I am pure מֵחַטָּאתִֽי׃ <WH2403> sin

אֶ֣בֶן <WH68> Differing וָ֭אֶבֶן <WH68> weights אֵיפָ֣ה <WH374> and differing וְאֵיפָ֑ה <WH374> measures תּוֹעֲבַ֥ת <WH8441> abomination יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> to the LORD גַּם־ <WH1571> of them [are] alike שְׁנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH8147> both

גַּ֣ם <WH1571> again בְּ֭מַעֲלָלָיו <WH4611> by his doings יִתְנַכֶּר־ <WH5234> is known נָ֑עַר <WH5288> Even a child אִם־ <WH518> If זַ֖ךְ <WH2134> [be] pure וְאִם־ <WH518> If יָשָׁ֣ר <WH3477> and whether [it be] right פָּעֳלֽוֹ׃ <WH6467> whether his work

אֹ֣זֶן <WH241> ear שֹׁ֭מַעַת <WH8085> The hearing וְעַ֣יִן <WH5869> eye רֹאָ֑ה <WH7200> and the seeing יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD עָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> hath made גַם־ <WH1571> even שְׁנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH8147> even both

אַל־ <WH408> not תֶּֽאֱהַ֣ב <WH157> Love שֵׁ֭נָה <WH8142> not sleep פֶּן־ <WH6435> or תִּוָּרֵ֑שׁ <WH3423> lest thou come to poverty פְּקַ֖ח <WH6491> open עֵינֶ֣יךָ <WH5869> thine eyes שְֽׂבַֽע־ <WH7646> [and] thou shalt be satisfied לָֽחֶם׃ <WH3899> with bread

רַ֣ע <WH7451> [It is] naught רַ֭ע <WH7451> [it is] naught יֹאמַ֣ר <WH559> saith הַקּוֹנֶ֑ה <WH7069> the buyer וְאֹזֵ֥ל <WH235> but when he is gone ל֝֗וֹ אָ֣ז <WH227> then יִתְהַלָּֽל׃ <WH1984> his way then he boasteth

יֵ֣שׁ <WH3426> There is זָ֭הָב <WH2091> gold וְרָב־ <WH7230> and a multitude פְּנִינִ֑ים <WH6443> of rubies וּכְלִ֥י <WH3627> jewel יְ֝קָ֗ר <WH3366> [are] a precious שִׂפְתֵי־ <WH8193> but the lips דָֽעַת׃ <WH1847> of knowledge

לְֽקַח־ <WH3947> Take בִּ֭גְדוֹ <WH899> his garment כִּי־ <WH3588> when עָ֣רַב <WH6148> that is surety זָ֑ר <WH2114> [for] a stranger וּבְעַ֖ד <WH1157> about [נָכְרִים כ] (נָכְרִיָּ֣ה <WH5237> alien ק) חַבְלֵֽהוּ׃ <WH2254> and take a pledge

עָרֵ֣ב <WH6149> be pleasant לָ֭אִישׁ <WH376> to a man לֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> Bread שָׁ֑קֶר <WH8267> of deceit וְ֝אַחַ֗ר <WH310> but afterwards יִמָּֽלֵא־ <WH4390> shall be filled פִ֥יהוּ <WH6310> his mouth חָצָֽץ׃ <WH2687> with gravel
מַ֭חֲשָׁבוֹת <WH4284> [Every] purpose בְּעֵצָ֣ה <WH6098> by counsel תִכּ֑וֹן <WH3559> is established וּ֝בְתַחְבֻּל֗וֹת <WH8458> and with good advice עֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH6213> make מִלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> war

גּֽוֹלֶה־ <WH1540> revealeth סּ֭וֹד <WH5475> secrets הוֹלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> He that goeth about רָכִ֑יל <WH7400> [as] a talebearer וּלְפֹתֶ֥ה <WH6601> not with him that flattereth שְׂ֝פָתָ֗יו <WH8193> with his lips לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תִתְעָרָֽב׃ <WH6148> therefore meddle

מְ֭קַלֵּל <WH7043> Whoso curseth אָבִ֣יו <WH1> his father וְאִמּ֑וֹ <WH517> or his mother יִֽדְעַ֥ךְ <WH1846> shall be put out נֵ֝ר֗וֹ <WH5216> his lamp [בְּאִישֹׁון כ] (בֶּאֱשׁ֥וּן <WH380> apple ק) חֹֽשֶׁךְ׃ <WH2822> darkness

נַ֭חֲלָה <WH5159> An inheritance [מְבֻחֶלֶת כ] (מְבֹהֶ֣לֶת <WH973> abhor ק) בָּרִאשֹׁנָ֑ה <WH7223> at the beginning וְ֝אַחֲרִיתָ֗הּ <WH319> but the end לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תְבֹרָֽךְ׃ <WH1288> thereof shall not be blessed

אַל־ <WH408> not תֹּאמַ֥ר <WH559> Say אֲשַׁלְּמָה־ <WH7999> not thou I will recompense רָ֑ע <WH7451> evil קַוֵּ֥ה <WH6960> [but] wait on לַֽ֝יהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD וְיֹ֣שַֽׁע <WH3467> and he shall save לָֽךְ׃

תּוֹעֲבַ֣ת <WH8441> [are] an abomination יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֶ֣בֶן <WH68> Differing וָאָ֑בֶן <WH68> weights וּמֹאזְנֵ֖י <WH3976> balance מִרְמָ֣ה <WH4820> and a false לֹא־ <WH3808> is not טֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> [is] not good
מֵיְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> [are] of the LORD מִצְעֲדֵי־ <WH4703> goings גָ֑בֶר <WH1397> Man's וְ֝אָדָ֗ם <WH120> how can a man מַה־ <WH4100> How יָּבִ֥ין <WH995> then understand דַּרְכּֽוֹ׃ <WH1870> is a

מוֹקֵ֣שׁ <WH4170> [It is] a snare אָ֭דָם <WH120> to the man יָ֣לַע <WH3216> [who] devoureth קֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> [that which is] holy וְאַחַ֖ר <WH310> and after נְדָרִ֣ים <WH5088> vows לְבַקֵּֽר׃ <WH1239> to make enquiry
מְזָרֶ֣ה <WH2219> scattereth רְ֭שָׁעִים <WH7563> the wicked מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king חָכָ֑ם <WH2450> A wise וַיָּ֖שֶׁב <WH7725> and bringeth עֲלֵיהֶ֣ם <WH5921> over אוֹפָֽן׃ <WH212> the wheel

נֵ֣ר <WH5216> [is] the candle יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> of the LORD נִשְׁמַ֣ת <WH5397> The spirit אָדָ֑ם <WH120> of man חֹ֝פֵ֗שׂ <WH2664> searching כָּל־ <WH3605> all חַדְרֵי־ <WH2315> all the inward parts בָֽטֶן׃ <WH990> of the belly
חֶ֣סֶד <WH2617> Mercy וֶ֭אֱמֶת <WH571> and truth יִצְּרוּ־ <WH5341> preserve מֶ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> the king וְסָעַ֖ד <WH5582> is upholden בַּחֶ֣סֶד <WH2617> by mercy כִּסְאֽוֹ׃ <WH3678> and his throne

תִּפְאֶ֣רֶת <WH8597> The glory בַּחוּרִ֣ים <WH970> of young men כֹּחָ֑ם <WH3581> [is] their strength וַהֲדַ֖ר <WH1926> and the beauty זְקֵנִ֣ים <WH2205> of old men שֵׂיבָֽה׃ <WH7872> [is] the gray head

חַבֻּר֣וֹת <WH2250> The blueness פֶּ֭צַע <WH6482> of a wound [תַּמְרִיק כ] (תַּמְר֣וּק <WH4838> bright ק) בְּרָ֑ע <WH7451> away evil וּ֝מַכּ֗וֹת <WH4347> so [do] stripes חַדְרֵי־ <WH2315> the inward parts בָֽטֶן׃ <WH990> of the belly
